name: Walk the Fort
description:
Reclaim your homeland with the ultimate guardian - a living, walking, shooting, and crunching fort. Destroy enemy forces across 60 levels by decking out your fort with over 12 weaponized tower types.

Upgrade smarter! Learning from the visually-depicted lore helps you equip better items for the battles ahead. And when the fight gets too close, your personal walking fort will be happy to trample tiny enemies under its feet in crunchy melee combat.

Customize a strategy with over 110 skills and upgrades
40 (+20 bonus) hectic levels, 16 bosses and over 100 enemies
Crunchy melee combat and environment destruction
Visually-depicted lore and an original industrial synthwave soundtrack
